Name: IIS - Add an Allow ISAPI And CGI Restriction Exception
Description: Adds an IIS Server Allow exception to the ISAPI/CGI Restrictions in IIS 7 and above.
Author: ekrapfl

Parameters.Name: cgiIsapiExtensionPath
Parameters.Label: CGI/ISAPI Extension Path
Parameters.HelpText: The full path to the ISAPI/CGI extension to allow.

Parameters.Name: description
Parameters.Label: Description
Parameters.HelpText: A description for the ISAPI/CGI Restriction allowance exception.
